entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
